article.title: Status and history for [hau_NE]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: the text on the OHCHR site is the result of "ASCIIfying" the original text which was actually provided by Don Osborn; going back to that text.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
